<style>
  .overlay-controls {
    background: red;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 900;
  }

  .overlay-content {
    border: 5px solid red;
    width: 90vw;
    height: 90vh;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  #quarto-overlay-content {
    overflow-y: scroll;
    height: 84vh; /* Somehow this makes overflow work. */
